text: vah ginatee ke kuchh din hain. phir yadi tumamen se koee rogee athava yaatra par ho, to ye ginatee, doosare dinon se pooree kare aur jo us roze ko sahan na kar sake[1], vah fidya (praayashchitt) de, jo ek nirdhan ko khaana khilaana hai aur jo svechchha bhalaee kare, vah usake lie achchhee baat hai. yadee tum samajho, to tumhaare lie roza rakhana hee achchha hai
